room_title: Escape room "Underworld" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: I had never played an escape room before, but my friend invited me so I went. Now, I am addicted. I had no idea what to expect and I was really impressed with the way the room was decorated and set up. I was actually shocked at how much fun we had. I can't wait to try the other rooms.
